title: What is worse: feeding or insulting?
body:
Three games in a row today and insulted/harassed by rude and bully kids.
The problems always arise during champions/role selection, someone is quicker than me to choose a role then I don't even have the time to read on the screen and replay that the bully starts offending and verbally abusing.
Same pattern continues during the game so I warn them that if they don't apologize, I would start feeding.
No good luck either so they insult even more.

replies.body:
1. there is a language filter 
2. grow up or get out. THE SITE AND THE GAME ARE NOT DIRECTED AT CHILDREN UNDER 13 YEARS OF AGE, NOR DOES RIOT GAMES KNOWINGLY COLLECT INFORMATION FROM CHILDREN UNDER 13. IF YOU ARE UNDER 13, PLEASE DO NOT SUBMIT ANY PERSONALLY IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION TO RIOT GAMES. 
3. Nobody cares if your a delicate flower, your not some kid  with "affluenza" so stop acting like it.
4. Life is hard and people will put you down, if you listen to them, or let them put you down, you deserve it. As much as i dislike the term, the whole "Haters" attitude applies.

Welcome to School Holidays Ladies and Gents.

who cares? insulting your teammates makes nothing better. if they sucked before. and you demoralize them. they will only suck more. its basic psychology man.

life does not have to be hard man, i am sorry for whatever happened to you. but it is possible to just not be an asshole.
